CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins=Onemogućeni priključci CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins.hint=Lista onemogućenih priključaka. CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons=Onemogućene značajke alatne trake CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons.hint=Lista onemogućenih značajki alatne trake. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab=Poveznica: Prikaži karticu Napredno CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab.hint=Omogućava postavljanje atributa poveznica poput identifikatora, imena, klase ili stila. CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab=Poveznica: Prikaži karticu Odredište CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab.hint=Omogućava postavljanje atributa za odredište poveznice (npr. za otvaranje poveznice u novoj kartici). ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions=Load JavaScript Skin Extensions ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions.hint=Some rendering macros are displayed using JavaScript code. Loading the JavaScript code improves the WYSIWYG aspect of the editor but it may cause problems if the JavaScript code interferes with the CKEditor code or if it changes content outside of the macro output boundaries. CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced=Napredna konfiguracija CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced.hint=Možete napisati isječak JavaScript kôda za izravnu izmjenu konfiguracijskog objekta. Provjerite {0}CKEditor dokumentaciju{1} za listu dostupnih konfiguracijskih svojstava.

### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.title=Import Office File ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath=File Path ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath.hint=Choose the office file to import. The file will be uploaded and attached to this page and its content inserted in the content of the page. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles=Filter Styles ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles.hint=Filter text styles like font, color, alignment, margins. Content structure including heading levels, paragraphs, lists and tables are preserved. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer=Use the Office Viewer ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer.hint=Check this option if you don't plan to edit the content of the office file after the import or if you don't want to mix the content of the office file with the content that you are currently editing. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.required=Required ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.import=Import ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.inProgress=Importing office file... ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.done=Office file successfully imported. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.fail=Office import failed. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.noUploadURL=File upload URL is not configured. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.failedToLoadForm=Failed to load the form.
ckeditor.plugin.resource.notSpecified={0} nije naznačeno. ckeditor.plugin.save.leaveConfirmationMessage=Ima nespremljenih izmjena. Želite li ih zanemariti? ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.save.failed=The content cannot be saved because of a CKEditor internal error. You should try to copy your important changes and reload the editor. ckeditor.plugin.source.conversionFailed=Konverzija nije uspjela.
